action_items.description: Kick start activations to support this customer

voc.remarks: The shop owner has wants a quick resolution on the payment term with Boa Tosha. Because they claim that they get charged 4% higher when they pay them through the "lipa na Mpesa" option which is the only option they pay through due to the 0 days credit terms.
Currently there aren't any promotions running in this outlet . But I'm planning to bring some freebies over
